price: (Wͻ’yε) awoͻ ntoatoasoͻ a wͻ’firi wͻn ho wͻn ho mu. Onyankopͻn ne Otiefoͻ, Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
